effect_entries.effect: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
effect_entries.short_effect: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.

effect_entries.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its water-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Strengthens water moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.
